body_html: @apaszke Can I get a review to make sure I am on the right track? Specifically, is it ok to implement _sparse_sum() as backend, and only allow function variants? Is the current approach to put sum() under torch.sparse namespace looks correct?
body_text: @apaszke Can I get a review to make sure I am on the right track? Specifically, is it ok to implement _sparse_sum() as backend, and only allow function variants? Is the current approach to put sum() under torch.sparse namespace looks correct?
body: @apaszke Can I get a review to make sure I am on the right track? Specifically, is it ok to implement `_sparse_sum()` as backend, and only allow function variants? Is the current approach to put `sum()` under torch.sparse namespace looks correct?
